ruleBookInfo.author: class.book-rand-a@tag.span.0@text
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
result=
'分类：'+
String(java.getString('class.tag-small orange@html&&class.tag-small gray@html')).replace(/,/g,' / ')
+'\n标签：'+
String(java.getString('class.tag-small-group origin-left@class.red@html')).replace(/\s/g,'，')
+'\n状态：'+
java.getString('class.book-cell@tag.p.1@ownText##.*万字')
+'\n字数：'+
java.getString('class.book-cell@tag.p.1@ownText##连载|完结')
+'\n更新时间：'+
java.getString('class.gray ell@text##·.*')
+'\n-------------------------------------------------\n'+
java.getString('id.bookSummary@tag.content@textNodes');
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name:
class.book-title.0@text
@js:java.put('sm',result.replace(/\s/g,' '))
